description:
Papa and the others find out just how far they can go on late night shows.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shin`ya no Genkai ni Chousen Suru / Tere Higashi kara Sakebidashi / Mohanteki na Shin`ya! Tensai Bakabon
We Test the Limits of Late Night!
深夜の限界に挑戦する / テレ東からの呼び出し / 模範的な深夜! 天才バカボン
